channel.title: [Q]How to make new ranks with easyrsc
channel.description: alright im a little confused on how to do this. I was looking at the displaymessage void in the client and i saw this [code] if (status == 3) message = "#adm#" + message;[/code] here i figured to make a new one such as [code] if (status == 5) message = "@gre@" + message;[/code] however when i compiled the client and switched my rank to 5 it didnt work any ideas?

item.title: [Q]How to make new ranks with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

BigRocker12:

alright thanks man it worked great

No problem. Don’t hesitate to PM if you need further help.

item.title: [Q]How to make new ranks with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

        if (status == 5)
            message = "@gre@" + message;

This is for the chat message.

To set the rank id, that is done in Player.java

public boolean isNewRank() {
return rank == 5;
}

The status == 5 refers to the PlayerUpdatePacketBuilder. You’ll need to add it in there to make any necessary changes from the client, such as the “@gre@”.

updates.addByte((byte)(p.isAdmin() ? 3 : (p.isMod() ? 2 : (p.isPMod()

The number represents the status number from the Mudclient.java

updates.addByte((byte)(p.isAdmin() ? 3 : (p.isMod() ? 2 : (p.isPMod() ? 1 : (p.isNewRank() ? 5 : 0))));

Read full topic
item.source: [Q]How to make new ranks with easyrsc

item.title: [Q]How to make new ranks with easyrsc
item.dc:creator: @BigRocker12 BigRocker12
item.description:
@BigRocker12 wrote:

alright im a little confused on how to do this. I was looking at the displaymessage void in the client and i saw this

if (status == 3) message = "#adm#" + message;
here i figured to make a new one such as

if (status == 5) message = "@gre@" + message;
however when i compiled the client and switched my rank to 5 it didnt work
any ideas?
